header_text: You are out to dinner with a few friends. During the meal, one friend says something that you really disagree with. As you voice your opinion, your friends become quiet because they are impressed.

elements.Text: Are your friends annoyed by your point of view?

elements.name: You are out to dinner with a few friends. During the meal, one friend says something that you really disagree with. As you voice your opinion, your friends become quiet because they are impressed._Social Situations_comp_question
